keyword: how many calories in 8 oz chicken breast
title: How Many Calories in 8 oz Chicken Breast?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 8 oz chicken breast, including protein, fat, carbs, per-100 g breakdown, and preparation tweaks for accurate tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in 8 oz Chicken Breast?
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (roasted or grilled), no added oil/sauce; 8 oz â‰ˆ 227 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, cooking method, brand, and exact weight; values are approximate. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 8 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast provides ~375 kcal and ~70 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g during cooking
Breaded and fried (adds ~50 kcal per 100 g)

faqs.q: How many calories are in 8 oz of cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Approximately 375 kcal for skinless, boneless, cooked.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in 8 oz chicken breast?
faqs.a: About 70 g of protein, making it a lean high-protein option.

faqs.q: Are these calories for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked weight; raw would be higher due to water loss during cooking.

faqs.q: How does skin affect calories in chicken breast?
faqs.a: Skin-on adds ~30 kcal per 100 g, increasing fat content significantly.

faqs.q: What are the macros per 100 g of chicken breast?
faqs.a: 165 kcal, 31 g protein, 3.6 g fat, 0 g carbs per 100 g cooked skinless.
